fields.description: Specification of the project cloning request. Only project name is required if projectCloneRequest is provided
The project settings to clone. Possible values are: PROJECT_SETTINGS, USERS_AND_GROUPS, APPLICATION_ID, CUSTOM_FIELD_DATA. Required if projectCloneRequest is provided
The URLs of the versions to clone with the project. Required if projectCloneRequest is provided
The URL of the project to clone. Required if projectCloneRequest is provided
The level of exposure the project has to potential attackers.
Whether BOM level adjustments applied at the project level are propogated to all project versions
The general identifier of the project
Summary of what the project represents in terms of functionality and use
URL to the representation of the user to assign as the project's owner
The set of categories of data to clone when creating a new project version.
If the project should be matched against for future scans
Whether Deep License Data is computed, only used when feature is enabled
Specification of the initial version to create with the project
The general identifier of the version. Required if versionRequest is provided
An alternative commonly used name or alias for the project version
The combination of licenses to assign to the project version
The relation of contained licenses.
URL to the representation of the license to assign
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
Pertinent comments or notes associated with the version
The logical date the version became available for usage
The phase in the development life-cycle of the version. Required if versionRequest is provided.
The distribution channel of the version. Required if versionRequest is provided.
Whether or not the project version is protected from automatic deletion
